title: Please help with information on Massimo Vignelli
content: Doing a seminar at university, would love to have some opinion's on Vignelli, please, if you can, comment on his typographic style, and character, much appreciated..NEWMAN..
author: newman

comments.content:
When do you need comments by?  
I had followed Massimo Vignelli's work during the 1980s to early 1990s and could write a few impressions of his work during that period. I need some time since there are a few other topic areas I have committed my time to first.
Wow, sounds great, my first seminar is this sunday, but i have a few going for a few weeks, so any litle details would be great, just trying to get some other points of view... cheers..
